hpb.title: Hotel Pousada Bambuzal
hpb.desc: A hotel website created for a client in Brazil. The goal of the website is to showcase the amenities and services of the hotel.
hpb.techStack: NextJs, Material UI, Bootstrap, NodeJs, MySQL

rm.title: Route Map
rm.desc: An application to calculate fuel and toll expenses for car trips. The application also shows the route on the map.
rm.techStack: React Native, Expo, Google Maps API, Firebase, Styled Components

lbt.title: Learn Build Teach
lbt.desc: An public international community of developers, designers, and creators who are passionate about learning, building, and teaching others.
